description: The PAT_RESERVATION table contains reservation-related information for a patient.  The table will contain one row per patient encounter.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: RES_CALLER_NAME
columns.description: The person who called to make a reservation for the patient.

columns.name: RES_CALLER_PHONE
columns.description: The phone number of the person who called to make a reservation for the patient.

columns.name: RES_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the department where the reservation call was received.

columns.name: RES_CALLED_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the reservation request was received.

columns.name: RES_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who received the reservation request.

columns.name: RES_ADM_APRV_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the admission for the patient was approved.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: RES_DENIAL_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the admission denial reason.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: RES_TRANS_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the reason behind the transfer request.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: RES_EXP_PAT_CLS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the patient's expected patient class.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: RES_EXP_LOC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the patient's expected level of care.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: RES_DECISION_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the decision on whether to accept the reservation was made.
